Package com.flipfit.business

Class GymOwnerService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.GymOwnerService
public class GymOwnerService extends Object
The GymOwnerService class provides the business logic for all operations a gym owner can perform.

  • Method Details

    • addCentre

      public void addCentre(GymCentre gymData)
      Adds a new gym center to the system and its corresponding slots.
      Parameters:
      gymData - A GymCentre object containing the details of the new gym center.

    • viewGymDetails

      public List<GymCentre> viewGymDetails(int ownerId)
      Retrieves the details of all gym centers owned by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A list of GymCentre objects.

    • viewBookings

      public List<Booking> viewBookings(int ownerId, int gymId) throws MismatchinputException
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific gym owned by the given owner. Includes a check to ensure the owner has permission to view the gym's bookings.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner.
      gymId - The ID of the gym.
      Returns:
      A List of Booking objects for the specified gym.
      Throws:
      MismatchinputException - if the owner does not own the gym.

    • viewCustomers

      public List<User> viewCustomers()
      Retrieves the list of all customers.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing all customers.

    • viewPayments

      public List<Payment> viewPayments()
      Retrieves the payment history for all customers.
      Returns:
      A list of Payment objects.

    • editGymOwnerDetails

      public GymOwner editGymOwnerDetails(int ownerId, User updatedUser, GymOwner updatedGymOwner)
      Updates the details for a gym owner. This method is designed to work with a REST API, accepting a User and GymOwner object directly.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner whose details are to be updated.
      updatedUser - The User object with the new values.
      updatedGymOwner - The GymOwner object with the new values.
      Returns:
      The updated GymOwner object.
